narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Michael Lonski is a Psychologist provider based in New York, NY. From 2018-01 through 2020-02, this provider received $506K in Medicaid payments across 6K claims serving 809 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 99% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 90837 (90837). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Billing stopped in 2020-02, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
